3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\auth;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\http\USession;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\http\URequest;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\flash\FlashMessage;
8 use Ubiquity\controllers\ControllerBase;
9 use Ubiquity\controllers\Auth\AuthFiles;
10 use Ubiquity\utils\http\UResponse;
11 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
12 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
13 use Ajax\service\Javascript;
14 use Ubiquity\utils\http\UCookie;
15 use Ubiquity\controllers\semantic\InsertJqueryTrait;
16 
22 abstract class AuthController extends ControllerBase , AuthControllerCoreTrait,AuthControllerVariablesTrait,AuthControllerOverrideTrait,InsertJqueryTrait {
23 
28  protected $authFiles;
29  protected $_controller;
30  protected $_action;
31  protected $_actionParams;
32  protected $_noAccessMsg;
33  protected $_loginCaption;
34  protected $_attemptsSessionKey = "_attempts";
35  protected $_controllerInstance;
36 
37  public function __construct($instance = null) {
38  parent::__construct ();
39  $this->insertJquerySemantic ();
40  $this->_controller = Startup::getController ();
41  $this->_action = Startup::getAction ();
42  $this->_actionParams = Startup::getActionParams ();
43  $this->_noAccessMsg = new FlashMessage ( "You are not authorized to access the page <b>{url}</b> !", "Forbidden access", "error", "warning circle" );
44  $this->_loginCaption = "Log in";
45  $this->_controllerInstance = $instance;
46  if (isset ( $instance ))
47  Startup::injectDependences ( $instance );
48  }
49 
50  public function index() {
51  if (($nbAttempsMax = $this->attemptsNumber ()) !== null) {
52  $nb = USession::getTmp ( $this->_attemptsSessionKey, $nbAttempsMax );
53  if ($nb <= 0) {
54  $this->badLogin ();
55  return;
56  }
57  }
58  $this->authLoadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewIndex (), [ "action" => $this->getBaseUrl () . "/connect","loginInputName" => $this->_getLoginInputName (),"loginLabel" => $this->loginLabel (),"passwordInputName" => $this->_getPasswordInputName (),"passwordLabel" => $this->passwordLabel (),"rememberCaption" => $this->rememberCaption () ] );
59  }
60 
66  public final function isValid($action) {
67  return true;
68  }
69 
75  public function noAccess($urlParts) {
76  if (! is_array ( $urlParts )) {
77  $urlParts = explode ( ".", $urlParts );
78  }
79  USession::set ( "urlParts", $urlParts );
80  $fMessage = $this->_noAccessMsg;
81  $this->noAccessMessage ( $fMessage );
82  $message = $this->fMessage ( $fMessage->parseContent ( [ "url" => implode ( "/", $urlParts ) ] ) );
83  /*
84  * if(URequest::isAjax()){
85  * $this->jquery->get($this->_getBaseRoute()."/info/f","#_userInfo",["historize"=>false,"jqueryDone"=>"replaceWith","hasLoader"=>false,"attr"=>""]);
86  * $this->jquery->compile($this->view);
87  * }
88  */
89  $this->authLoadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewNoAccess (), [ "_message" => $message,"authURL" => $this->getBaseUrl (),"bodySelector" => $this->_getBodySelector (),"_loginCaption" => $this->_loginCaption ] );
90  }
91 
95  public function connect() {
96  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
97  if ($connected = $this->_connect ()) {
98  if (isset ( $_POST ["ck-remember"] )) {
99  $this->rememberMe ( $connected );
100  }
101  if (USession::exists ( $this->_attemptsSessionKey )) {
102  USession::delete ( $this->_attemptsSessionKey );
103  }
104  $this->onConnect ( $connected );
105  } else {
106  $this->onBadCreditentials ();
107  }
108  }
109  }
110 
114  public function badLogin() {
115  $fMessage = new FlashMessage ( "Invalid creditentials!", "Connection problem", "warning", "warning circle" );
116  $this->badLoginMessage ( $fMessage );
117  $attemptsMessage = "";
118  if (($nbAttempsMax = $this->attemptsNumber ()) !== null) {
119  $nb = USession::getTmp ( $this->_attemptsSessionKey, $nbAttempsMax );
120  $nb --;
121  if ($nb < 0)
122  $nb = 0;
123  if ($nb == 0) {
124  $fAttemptsNumberMessage = $this->noAttempts ();
125  } else {
126  $fAttemptsNumberMessage = new FlashMessage ( "<i class='ui warning icon'></i> You still have {_attemptsCount} attempts to log in.", null, "bottom attached warning", "" );
127  }
128  USession::setTmp ( $this->_attemptsSessionKey, $nb, $this->attemptsTimeout () );
129  $this->attemptsNumberMessage ( $fAttemptsNumberMessage, $nb );
130  $fAttemptsNumberMessage->parseContent ( [ "_attemptsCount" => $nb,"_timer" => "<span id='timer'></span>" ] );
131  $attemptsMessage = $this->fMessage ( $fAttemptsNumberMessage, "timeout-message" );
132  $fMessage->addType ( "attached" );
133  }
134  $message = $this->fMessage ( $fMessage, "bad-login" ) . $attemptsMessage;
135  $this->authLoadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewNoAccess (), [ "_message" => $message,"authURL" => $this->getBaseUrl (),"bodySelector" => $this->_getBodySelector (),"_loginCaption" => $this->_loginCaption ] );
136  }
137 
142  public function terminate() {
143  USession::terminate ();
144  $fMessage = new FlashMessage ( "You have been properly disconnected!", "Logout", "success", "checkmark" );
145  $this->terminateMessage ( $fMessage );
146  $message = $this->fMessage ( $fMessage );
147  $this->authLoadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewNoAccess (), [ "_message" => $message,"authURL" => $this->getBaseUrl (),"bodySelector" => $this->_getBodySelector (),"_loginCaption" => $this->_loginCaption ] );
148  }
149 
150  public function _disConnected() {
151  $fMessage = new FlashMessage ( "You have been disconnected from the application!", "Logout", "", "sign out" );
152  $this->disconnectedMessage ( $fMessage );
153  $message = $this->fMessage ( $fMessage );
154  $this->jquery->getOnClick ( "._signin", $this->getBaseUrl (), $this->_getBodySelector (), [ "stopPropagation" => false,"preventDefault" => false ] );
155  $this->jquery->execOn ( "click", "._close", "window.open(window.location,'_self').close();" );
156  return $this->jquery->renderView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewDisconnected (), [ "_title" => "Session ended","_message" => $message ], true );
157  }
158 
165  public function info($force = null) {
166  if (isset ( $force )) {
167  $displayInfoAsString = ($force === true) ? true : false;
168  } else {
169  $displayInfoAsString = $this->_displayInfoAsString ();
170  }
171  return $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewInfo (), [ "connected" => USession::get ( $this->_getUserSessionKey () ),"authURL" => $this->getBaseUrl (),"bodySelector" => $this->_getBodySelector () ], $displayInfoAsString );
172  }
173 
174  public function checkConnection() {
175  UResponse::asJSON ();
176  echo "{\"valid\":" . UString::getBooleanStr ( $this->_isValidUser () ) . "}";
177  }
178 
188  public function _setNoAccessMsg($content, $title = NULL, $type = NULL, $icon = null) {
189  $this->_noAccessMsg->setValues ( $content, $title, $type, $icon );
190  }
191 
196  public function _setLoginCaption($_loginCaption) {
197  $this->_loginCaption = $_loginCaption;
198  }
199 
203  public function _autoConnect() {
204  $cookie = $this->getCookieUser ();
205  if (isset ( $cookie )) {
206  $user = $this->fromCookie ( $cookie );
207  if (isset ( $user )) {
208  USession::set ( $this->_getUserSessionKey (), $user );
209  }
210  }
211  }
212 
216  public function forgetConnection() {
217  UCookie::delete ( $this->_getUserSessionKey () );
218  $this->index ();
219  }
220 
226  public function finalize() {
227  if (! UResponse::isJSON ()) {
228  if (! URequest::isAjax ()) {
229  if (isset ( $this->_controllerInstance )) {
230  call_user_func_array ( array ($this->_controllerInstance,'parent::finalize' ), [ ] );
231  } else {
232  parent::finalize ();
233  }
234  }
235  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( "if($('#_userInfo').length){\$('#_userInfo').html(" . preg_replace ( "/$\R?^/m", "", Javascript::prep_element ( $this->info () ) ) . ");}" );
236  echo $this->jquery->compile ();
237  }
238  }
239 
245  public function initialize() {
246  if (! URequest::isAjax ()) {
247  if (isset ( $this->_controllerInstance )) {
248  call_user_func_array ( array ($this->_controllerInstance,'parent::initialize' ), [ ] );
249  } else {
250  parent::initialize ();
251  }
252  }
253  }
254 
259  public function _forward($url) {
260  $initFinalize = true;
261  if (isset ( $this->_controllerInstance ) && ! URequest::isAjax ()) {
262  $initFinalize = false;
263  }
264  Startup::forward ( $url, $initFinalize, $initFinalize );
265  }
266 }
